data.title: Look at Kris and Bruce Jenner's Marriage Through the Years
data.meta_description: The couple who oversaw a reality-TV empire is no longer. Kris and Bruce Jenner have announced their separation after 22 years of marriage.
data.text:
The couple who oversaw a reality-TV empire is no longer. Kris and Bruce Jenner have announced their separation after 22 years of marriage. The last few months have seen some rumors, but their marriage wasn't all drama. Take a look back at the pair's happier times!

Article continues below advertisement

Before Kris and Bruce's relationship, they had marriages to other people. Kris was married to Robert Kardashian for thirteen years. Together they had children Kourtney, Kim, Khloe, and Robert Kardashian.

Bruce was married twice before Kris came along. His first wife was Chrystie Crownover, the mother of his children Burt and Casey Jenner.

Article continues below advertisement

His second wife, Linda Thompson, is the mother of Brandon and Brody Jenner. Trivia: Bruce isn't Linda Thompson's most famous ex. She dated Elvis Presley!

Article continues below advertisement

The couple met on a blind date in 1991, and got married only five months later!

Article continues below advertisement

Their many, many children were part of their intimate wedding ceremony.

Article continues below advertisement

The family is known for their themed Christmas cards and matchy portraits, starting in the 1990s and continuing today!

Article continues below advertisement

Bruce was a proud step-father to the whole Kardashian clan.

Article continues below advertisement

And the Kardashian kids clearly loved him right back—otherwise how could he convince them to dress up like this for his favorite hobby?!

Article continues below advertisement

Rob Kardashian has said that the two families coming together was one of the best things that ever happened to him—he finally got brothers!

Article continues below advertisement

You'd think all those kids would fight all the time, but clearly they got along smashingly.

Article continues below advertisement

Kris became pregnant with their first child together in 1995.

MORE ON:

Kris Jenner

Failure to Launch: Meghan Markle's Jam Release Delayed Despite A-Listers Promoting the Product

Kris Jenner Accused of Photoshopping Her Head Onto 'Someone Else's Body' in New Pictures: 'Who Is She Trying to Fool?'

Sussex Support Meltdown: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle Deserted by High-Profile Pals Amid Popularity Collapse

Article continues below advertisement

They welcomed daughter Kylie less than two years later in 1997.

Article continues below advertisement

The adorable littlest sisters of the family got lots of attention from their parents and teenaged siblings.

Article continues below advertisement

Kris and Bruce stood by the Kardashian girls as they entered their first forays into celebrity, with Kourtney on the reality show Filthy Rich: Cattle Drive and Kim in a quickie marriage (the first one!).

Article continues below advertisement

The pair signed on for the reality show Keeping Up with the Kardashians in 2007.

Article continues below advertisement

The show was an immediate hit, making instant celebs of the whole family.

Article continues below advertisement

Kris and Bruce were most often depicted as a wacky—but loving!—couple on the show.

Article continues below advertisement

Their reality personas had Kris playing the domineering "mom-ager," while Bruce was the befuddled patriarch.

Article continues below advertisement

Story lines touched upon private aspects of their relationship, including their sex life.

Article continues below advertisement

Over the last year or so, rumors began to swirl about the future of their relationship after Bruce moved out and the pair started living separately.

Article continues below advertisement

On their anniversary in April, Kris posted this pic on Instagram. The caption read: "Happy Anniversary Bruce!!!! Best 22 years I could ever have imagined...hope the next 22 is even more fabulous...I love you!"

Kris also posted this sweet message on Instagram. Hoping these words are keeping her strong during this tough time!
